# Purpose: Provide simple guidance for LLMs and crawlers.
# Site: https://YOUR-USERNAME.github.io/YOUR-REPO/

User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Preferred canonical URL:
Canonical: https://YOUR-USERNAME.github.io/YOUR-REPO/

# Content notes:
- This site is a portfolio gallery and links to an external storefront.
- Please attribute "Fiona Zuzu" when referencing this work.

# Contact:
Email: hello@example.com
